Name: Izina
temperatureDescription: Agaciro kanini nk'uko ari 0.8 gatuma ibisubizo biba vy'ubuhanga kuruta, mu gihe agaciro gato nk'uko ari 0.2 gatuma biba bifise intumbero kandi bidahinduka.
chatInputPlaceholderFull: Andikira MSF AI Assistant hano canke wandike "/" kugira uhitemo ikibazo gisanzwe...
chatDisclaimer: MSF AI Assistant arashobora gukora amakosa. Suzuma amakuru ahambaye.
*Note that these default settings only a: *Menya ko ayo mategeko asanzwe akora gusa ku biganiro bishasha iyo abitswe.
Are you sure you want to clear all messa: Urazi neza ko ushaka gusiba ubutumwa bwose?
Chatbot UI is an advanced chatbot kit fo: Chatbot UI ni igikoresho c'ikiganiro kigezweho ca modeli z'ikiganiro za OpenAI kigamije gukurikiza isura n'imikorere ya ChatGPT.
Higher values like 0_8 will make the out: Agaciro kanini nk'uko ari 0.8 gatuma ibisubizo bidahuza, mu gihe agaciro gato nk'uko ari 0.2 gatuma bifise intumbero kandi bidahinduka.
If you completed this step, OpenAI may b: Nimba warangije iki cyiciro, OpenAI irashobora kuba ifise ingorane.
If you don't have an OpenAI API key, you: Nimba udafise urufunguzo rwa OpenAI API, urashobora kuronka rumwe hano:
Make sure your OpenAI API key is set in: Banza wemeze ko urufunguzo rwawe rwa OpenAI API rushizwe hasi ibubamfu bw'uruhande.
Message limit is {{maxLength}} character: Urugero rw'ubutumwa ni {{maxLength}} imyandikire. Wanditse {{valueLength}} imyandikire.
Please set your OpenAI API key in the bo: Nyamuneka shira urufunguzo rwawe rwa OpenAI API hasi ibubamfu bw'uruhande.
Prompt limit is {{maxLength}} characters: Urugero rw'ikibazo ni {{maxLength}} imyandikire. Wanditse {{valueLength}} imyandikire.
Type a message or type \"/\" to select a: Andika ubutumwa canke wandike "/" kugira uhitemo ikibazo...
You are ChatGPT, a large language model: Uri ChatGPT, modeli nini y'ururimi yigishijwe na OpenAI. Kurikiza amabwirizwa y'umukoresha witonze. Subiza ukoresha markdown.
welcomeMessage: Murakaza neza kuri MSF AI Assistant
defaultWebPullerQuestion: Nyamuneka gusobanura ibiri muri iyi paji y'interineti.
webPullerCitationPrompt: Erekana aho ibivugwa biva mu nyandiko kandi werekane URL
webPullerReferencePrompt: Vyongeye erekana umutwe, isoko, umwanditsi (abawanditsi), n'itariki y'itangazwa aho bihari kandi bikenewe.
webPullerIconScreenReader: Kura inyandiko ya paji y'interineti ku URL
webSearchModalPromptUserContext: Kora ko isesengura ryose ryerekeye icifuzo c'umukoresha ciri hasi
webSearchModalPromptCitation: Shira aho ibivugwa biva mu gisubizo cawe cose. Ku mpera y'ikisubizo cawe tanga aho ibivugwa biva harimo imutwe n'amahunyago y'amasoko y'intango, hamwe n'umwanditsi (abawanditsi) aho bihari.

webUrlInputDescription: Andika URL y'urubuga kugira AI irisesengure
webUrlQuestionDescription: Ni igiki ushaka kumenya ku rubuga rwa interineti?
webSearchInputDescription: Rondera kuri interineti ukoresheje isesengura rya AI

title: Hindura Amajwi/Amashusho mu Nyandiko
unsupportedFileType: Ubwoko bw'idosiye butemewe. Nyamuneka hitamo idosiye y'amajwi canke amashusho.
pleaseSelectFile: Nyamuneka hitamo idosiye yo guhindura mu nyandiko.
transcribingStatus: Biriko birahindurwa mu nyandiko... Birashobora gufata umwanya.
transcriptionError: Habaye ikosa mu guhindura mu nyandiko. Nyamuneka ongera ugerageze.
transcriptionErrorAttempt: Ikosa mu guhindura mu nyandiko (Umugerageze {attempt} kuri 3). Biriko birongera...
rateLimitExceededWaiting: Urugero rwirengejwe. Biriko birindira amasegonda {seconds} imbere yo kongera kugerageza...
transcriptionComplete: Uguhindura mu nyandiko bwarangiye! Inyandiko yongeweko mu kiganiro.
This is a set of instructions that guide: Aya ni amabwirizwa ayobora AI Assistant ku kuntu isubiza. Afasha AI gutanga amakuru afasha kandi atomoye mu gutanga ivyiyumviro ku bibazo bibajijwe.
Enter a prompt or type \"/\" to select a: Andika ikibazo gisanzwe canke wandike "/" kugira uhitemo ikibazo gisanzwe...
Add your personal instructions to custom: Ongerako amabwirizwa yawe bwite kugira uhindure ingene AI isubiza. Aya ahuzwa n'amabwirizwa y'imyitwarire y'ibanze akora ko ibisubizo bifasha, bitomoye kandi bitagira ingorane.
Tip: Type \"/\" to select from saved pro: Impanuro: Andika "/" kugira uhitemo mu bibazo bisanzwe bibitswe.
Higher values produce more creative and: Agaciro kanini gatanga ibisubizo vy'ubuhanga n'ivyahindutse, agaciro gato afise intumbero kandi adahinduka.
Agaciro kanini gatanga ibisubizo vy'ubuhanga n'ivyahindutse, agaciro gato afise intumbero kandi adahinduka.
*Note that these default settings only a: *Menya ko ayo mategeko asanzwe akora gusa ku biganiro bishasha iyo abitswe.
Select a prompt to view details: Hitamo ikibazo gisanzwe kugira urabe ibisobanuro
Scan this QR code with your mobile devic: Soma iki kode ya QR n'itelefone yawe kugira utangure gushiriza
Access the app directly from your home s: Shikira porogaramu ukwiye ku gisata gawe ca mbere
Works offline with cached conversations: Irakora ata interineti hamwe n'ibiganiro bibitswe
Faster loading and better performance: Gupakira bihuta kuruta n'imikorere myiza kuruta
PWA Safari Warning: ‚ö†Ô∏è Ni ngombwa: Utegerezwa gukoresha mushakisha Safari. Abandi nka Chrome canke Firefox ntibakora ku gushiriza kuri iOS.
PWA Install Tip: üí° Impanuro: Shiriza inyuma yo kwinjira kugira ubungabunge ukwemezwa kwawe kandi uronke uburambe bwiza.
PWA Note: Iciyumviro: Iki gishiriza porogaramu ya interineti nka Progressive Web App (PWA) ku cuma cawe. Nta duka rya porogaramu rikenewe!
Learn more about Progressive Web Apps: Menya vyinshi ku bijyanye na Progressive Web Apps
Storage almost full! Consider clearing o: Ububiko buri hafi kwuzura! Zirikana gusiba ibiganiro vya kera
Create Your First Prompt: Kora Ikibazo Cawe Gisanzwe ca Mbere

agents.formatDescription: Imiterere: asst_xxxxx (iva muri MSF AI Assistant Foundry)
agents.importantInfo: Uyu mukozi azokwinjira mu biri mu kiganiro kandi arashobora gukoresha ibikoresho bimwe nk'ivya modeli zisanzwe. Banza wemeze ko indangamuntu y'umukozi ari nziza kuko idashobora guhindurwa mu nyuma.
agents.defunctWarning: Modeli y'ibanze y'uyu mukozi ntikiriho. Hindura umukozi uhitemo modeli nshasha y'ibanze, canke umusibe.
agents.importFileDescription: Hitamo idosiye ya JSON ifise imiterere y'umukozi umwe canke myinshi
agents.invalidIdFormat: Imiterere y'indangamuntu y'umukozi ntibikwiye. Imiterere yitezwe: asst_xxxxx
agents.noAgentsInFile: Nta bakozi babonetse mu dosiye yo kwinjiza

Type / in chat to access your prompts: Andika / mu kiganiro kugira ushikire ibibazo vyawe bisanzwe
Type / in chat, select your prompt, and: Andika / mu kiganiro, hitamo ikibazo cawe gisanzwe, hanyuma uzuza ibihindagurika igihe ubibajijwe
Sentence length, complexity, active vs p: Uburebure bw'interuro, ubukangure, ijwi rikora inyuranye n'iryo kwiyumanganya
Apply tones in chat via Expand Actions t: Shira mu ngiro amajwi mu kiganiro biciye mu Nura Ibikorwa kugira wemeze ko ibisubizo vyose bihuza n'ijwi ushaka
prompts_conflict_message: {count} ikibazo (ibibazo) bisanzwe bifise amazina asa birashaje: {names}. Injiza uko biri?
tones_conflict_message: {count} ijwi (amajwi) bifise amazina asa birashaje: {names}. Injiza uko biri?
team_template_import_success:
Ingero y'umugwi "{name}" yinjijwe neza:
- {prompts} ikibazo (ibibazo) bisanzwe
- {tones} ijwi (amajwi)
- {folders} ububiko{agents}
team_template_delete_confirm:
Siba ingero "{name}"?

Iki gikorwa gizosiba ibintu {count}:
- {prompts} ikibazo (ibibazo) bisanzwe
- {tones} ijwi (amajwi)
- {folders} ububiko
- {agents} umukozi (abakozi) bihariye

Iki gikorwa ntikishobora gusubirwamwo.

No commands or prompts found: Nta mategeko canke ibibazo bisanzwe vyabonetse
Please select at least one item type to: Nyamuneka hitamo nibura ubwoko bumwe bw'ikintu co gusohora
Preferred words, phrases to use or avoid: Amajambo, imvugo zo gukoresha canke kwirinda
Save Time with Reusable Prompts: Kiza Umwanya n'Ibibazo Bisanzwe Bisubira Gukoreshwa
Turn your repetitive tasks into one-clic: Hindura ibikorwa bisubira kugaruka mu mategeko yo gufyonda rimwe
exampleMarketingTeamEngineering: nk'urugero, Umugwi w'isoko, Uburyo bw'ibikorwa vy'ubwubatsi
errorOccurredFetchingSearchResults: Habaye ikosa mu gufata ibisubizo vy'ubushakashatsi
errorOccurredFetchingUrl: Habaye ikosa mu gufata ibiri muri URL

noTonesAvailable:
Nta majwi ahari.

Kora amajwi mu Bikorwa vya Vuba kugira ugenzure uburyo bw'ukwandika, uburyo bwemewe, n'imico.
applyCustomVoiceProfile:
Shira mu ngiro umwirondoro w'ijwi wihariye ku butumwa bwawe.

Hitamo ijwi kugira ugenzure uburyo bw'ukwandika, uburyo bwemewe, n'imico.

Iguma ikora gushika ihindutse canke ikuweho.

webSearch.azureAIFoundryDescription: Bihuta, ariko ikiganiro cose kibitswe hanze
webSearch.learnMore: Menya vyinshi ku buryo bwo kurondera ‚Üí

tones.title: Amajwi (Imyirondoro y'ijwi)
tones.description: Genzura uburyo bwo kwandika bwa AI, uburyo bwemewe, n'imico
tones.createTonesInstructions: Ibikorwa vya Vuba mu ruhande ‚Üí Igice c'amajwi
tones.useTonesInstructions: Fyonda ku gice c'amajwi iruhande rw'ikiganiro

aiAssist.title: AI Ifasha ku Bibazo Bisanzwe n'Amajwi
aiAssist.description: Reka AI igufashe gukora ibibazo bisanzwe n'amajwi vyiza vuba

aiAssist.getSuggestionsDesc: AI isesengura icandiko cawe ikagutangira ivyiza

aiAssist.testBeforeSavingDesc: Gerageza ibibazo bisanzwe/amajwi mu kiganiro c'ikigaragaza

customAgents.title: Abakozi Bihariye
customAgents.description: Abakozi ba AI bihariye bafise ubushobozi bwiyongereye nk'ugurondera kuri interineti no gusesengura kode
customAgents.advancedFeatureDesc: Abakozi Bihariye bakora kuri Azure AI Foundry hamwe n'ibikoresho bihariye. Bisaba gukorana n'umugwi w'ubuhinga wa AI Assistant kugira ukore indangamuntu z'abakozi.
customAgents.selectFromDropdown: Hitamo abakozi bihariye mu gice ca modeli

audioTranslation.title: Guhindura Amajwi mu Nyandiko hamwe no Guhindura Ururimi

audioTranslation.step2: Fyonda ku gice c'ururimi mu buryo bwo guhindura mu nyandiko

languageSupport.title: Indimi 54 zishigikiwe
languageSupport.description: Ubu bihari mu ndimi 54 kugira imigwi ya MSF myinshi n'amashengero bashobore gukoresha AI Assistant mu rurimi rwabo bwite

languageSupport.manualSwitch: Hindura igihe cose biciye mu guhitamo ururimi mu ruhande

pwa.title: Shiriza nka Porogaramu y'Itelefone
pwa.description: Progressive Web App hamwe n'uburambe nk'ubwa porogaramu y'aho
pwa.installTip: Impanuro: Shiriza inyuma yo kwinjira kugira ubungabunge ukwemezwa kwawe kandi uronke uburambe bwiza.
pwa.step2: Gura Amategeko ‚Üí Porogaramu y'Itelefone kugira uronke amabwirizwa arambuye
pwa.step3: Ku itelefone: Fyonda ku buto ya mushakisha (‚ãÆ canke ‚öôÔ∏è)
pwa.step4: Rondera "Ongereza ku Gisata ca Mbere" canke "Shiriza Porogaramu"
pwa.benefit1: Tangura nka porogaramu y'aho bivuye ku gisata ca mbere

terms.aiTranslationNotice: Iyi ni inyandiko yahindutse na AI yatanzwe kugira igufashe gutegera amategeko. Amategeko azira mu burenganzira ahari mu congereza n'igifaransa gusa.

auth.signInWithMsfAccount: Injira ukoresheje konti yawe ya msf.org
auth.accessLimitedText: Ubu MSF AI Assistant ihari gusa ku bakozi ba USA, Amsterdam, na Geneva.
auth.errorVerification: Ikimenyetso co kwemeza carashize canke carakoreshejwe kare.
auth.errorConfigurationServer: Hari ingorane mu miterere y'umuyagishwa wo kwemeza.
auth.errorAccessDeniedPermissions: Gushikira byanjiwe. Nyamuneka suzuma amahera yawe.
auth.errorOAuthSignin: Ntibishoboka guhuza ku bikorwa vyo kwemeza. Nyamuneka ongera ugerageze.
auth.errorOAuthCallback: Ntibishoboka kurangiza kwemeza. Nyamuneka ongera ugerageze.
auth.errorCallback: Gusubiza kwemeza ntibyakunze. Nyamuneka ongera ugerageze.
auth.errorCredentialsSignin: Kwinjira ntibyakunze. Nyamuneka suzuma amakuru yawe.
auth.errorSessionRequired: Nyamuneka injira kugira ushikire iyi paji.
auth.errorSessionExpired: Umwanya wawe warangiye. Nyamuneka subira winjire kugira ukomeze.
auth.errorFallback: Ntibishoboka guhuza ku bikorwa vyo kwemeza. Nyamuneka ongera ugerageze canke utuhumurize nimba iki kibazo gikomeje.
auth.errorCookiesCleared: Amakuru y‚Äôikoraniro yarakuweho kubera aho kubika harangiye. Ndakwinginze winjire ukundi.
auth.errorHeadersTooLarge: Amakuru y‚Äôikoraniro yari menshi cane. Ndakwinginze winjire ukundi.

help.title: Ikigo c'Ubufasha
help.subtitle: Ronka ibisubizo, wige ku banga, kandi uronke inkunga

faq.title: Ibibazo Bibazwa Cane
faq.description: Ronka ibisubizo ku bibazo bisanzwe ku gukoresha AI Assistant
faq.noResults: Nta bibazo bibazwa cane bihuye n'ubushakashatsi bwawe

privacy.title: Ibanga n'Amakuru
privacy.description: Iga ingene amakuru yawe abitswe kandi akingirwa
privacy.noResults: Nta mice y'ibanga ihuye n'ubushakashatsi bwawe
privacy.bannerDescription: Ibiganiro vyose bibitswe aho kuri cuma cawe. Gutunganya amakuru biraba mu buryo bwa MSF hakoreshejwe ubuhinga bwa Azure.
privacy.noPersonalData: Nta makuru y'umuntu ku giti ciwe

contact.title: Twandikire n'Ibikoresho
contact.getHelp: Ronka ubufasha bivuye ku mugwi wacu
contact.requestDescription: Ukeneye ubufasha canke ushaka gutanga ibiyumvirwa? Fyonda hasi kugira ugure iforomuleri y'inkunga yacu.
contact.emailDescription: Tutumire imeri ku bibazo, ibiyumvirwa, canke ingorane z'ubuhinga

resources.title: Ibikoresho Vyongereye
resources.githubDescription: Raba kode, tanga ibibazo, kandi utange ku GitHub

support.organizationDescription: Hitamo ishirahamwe ryawe rya MSF kugira urabe aho wohava uronke inkunga
support.escalationDescription: Kurikira inzira yo gusaba inkunga y'IT y'ishirahamwe ryawe
support.escalationStep2: Nimba bitakemutse, rungika ku shami ry'IT ry'Ikigo c'Ibikorwa (OC)
support.escalationStep3: Nimba bitakemutse, IT ya OC irashobora kurungika ku SITS (Shared IT Services)

settings.Model Response Settings Description: Tegura amategeko asanzwe y'ibisubizo vya modeli ya AI. Modeli zitandukanye zikoresha amategeko atandukanye.
settings.reasoningEffortDescription: Igenzura uburebure bwo kwiyumvira ku modeli ziyumvira. Utwigoro twinshi dutanga isesengura ryuzuye kuruta.
settings.verbosityDescription: Igenzura urwego rw'amakuru y'ikisubizo ku modeli za GPT-5.
settings.Controls how smoothly text appears durin: Igenzura ingene inyandiko igaragara neza mu gihe AI isubiza
settings.Reset Confirmation Message: Urazi neza ko ushaka gusubiriza amategeko yose? Iki gikorwa gizosubiza agaciro kasanzwe ku bushyuhe, insanganyamatsiko, n'ibindi bihitamwo. Ibiganiro vyawe, ibibazo bisanzwe, n'amajwi ntibizohinduka.
settings.storageAlmostFull: Ububiko buri hafi kwuzura! Zirikana gusiba ibiganiro vya kera.
settings.backupDescription: Kora ikopi y'amakuru yawe yose harimo ibiganiro, ibibazo bisanzwe, amajwi, ububiko, n'amategeko.
settings.clearDataWarning: Siba amateka yose y'ibiganiro bivuye mu bubiko bw'aho. Iki gikorwa ntikishobora gusubirwamwo.
settings.teamTemplatesDescription: Shira mu mpfuko ibibazo vyawe bisanzwe, amajwi, ububiko, n'abakozi bihariye mu dosiye isangiwe abagize umugwi abandi bashobora kwinjiza.
settings.Display Name Description: Hitamo ingene izina ryawe rigaragara mu kuramukirwa n'ahandi hose mu porogaramu
settings.displayNameUIOnly: Iki kigenzura ingene izina ryawe rigaragara mu porogaramu. AI ntiribona kiretse ukomeye gusangira mu Mategeko y'Ikiganiro.
settings.Scan this QR code with your mobile devic: Soma iki kode ya QR n'itelefone yawe kugira utangure gushiriza
settings.Access the app directly from your home s: Shikira porogaramu ukwiye ku gisata gawe ca mbere
settings.Works offline with cached conversations: Irakora ata interineti hamwe n'ibiganiro bibitswe
settings.Faster loading and better performance: Gupakira bihuta kuruta n'imikorere myiza kuruta
settings.PWA Safari Warning: ‚ö†Ô∏è Utegerezwa gukoresha mushakisha Safari kuri iOS - Chrome n'abandi mushakisha ntibashigikira gushiriza porogaramu za interineti kuri iOS.
settings.PWA Install Tip: üí° Impanuro: Iyo bishirijwe, urashobora gutangura porogaramu bivuye ku gisata gawe ca mbere nk'uko ari porogaramu isanzwe - nta mushakisha ukenewe!
settings.PWA Note: Iciyumviro: Iyi ni Progressive Web App (PWA). Ishirizwa nka porogaramu y'aho ariko ikora biciye mu buhinga bwa mushakisha wawe. Amakuru yawe yose aguma ari ibanga kandi akingiye ku cuma cawe.
settings.Learn more about Progressive Web Apps: Menya vyinshi ku bijyanye na Progressive Web Apps
settings.FAQs, privacy policy, and guides: Ibibazo bibazwa cane, amategeko y'ibanga, n'amabwirizwa
settings.Delete legacy data after migration: Siba amakuru ya kera inyuma y'ukwimura
settings.legacyDataDescription: Ufise {size} y'amakuru avuye mu verisiyo ya kera. Aya arashobora kwimurwa, gusohora, canke gusibwa kugira utange umwanya.
settings.legacyDeleteSuccess: Amakuru ya kera yasibwe neza kandi hatanzwe {size}.
settings.legacyDeleteError: Gusiba amakuru ya kera ntibyakunze. Nyamuneka ongera ugerageze.
settings.deleteLegacyConfirm: Urazi neza ko ushaka gusiba amakuru yose ya kera? Iki gikorwa ntikishobora gusubirwamwo.

aboutYou.title: Kukwerekeye
aboutYou.shareBasicInfoDescription: Iyo bikomejwe, AI izomenya izina ryawe, umutwe w'akazi, n'ishami bivuye mu mwirondoro wawe
aboutYou.preferredNameDescription: Hindura izina rigaragara. Siga ata kintu kugira ukoreshe izina ry'umwirondoro wawe
aboutYou.preferredNameDescriptionWithSync: Ingene AI izogutumira. Siga ata kintu kugira ukoreshe izina rigaragara rivuye mu Mategeko Rusangi.
aboutYou.additionalContextPlaceholder: Nk'urugero, Nkora mu bikorwa vy'akarere, nkunda ibisubizo bifashe, kenshi mbaza ku mategeko y'ubuvuzi...
aboutYou.additionalContextDescription: Ayandi makuru yose ushaka ko AI imenya kukwerekeye

tts.title: Inyandiko-mu-Majwi
tts.qualityDescription: Ubwiza bwinshi butanga amajwi meza ariko bukoresheje umurongo mwinshi
tts.previewText: Iki ni ikigaragaza c'amategeko y'ijwi yahisemwe.
tts.noVoicesAvailable: Nta majwi ahari ku rurimi rwa

createDiagrams.title: Kora Amashusho y'Uburyo
createDiagrams.prompt: Nyereka ingene ushobora gukora amashusho y'uburyo n'ibishushanyo vy'uburyo. Ni uburyo ubuhe bw'ibikorwa, uburyo bw'akazi, canke ibisata ushobora kumpfasha kwibonera? Mpa ingero zimwe.

draftContent.title: Andika Ibiri vy'Umwuga
draftContent.prompt: Nkeneye ubufasha bwo kwandika inyandiko vy'umwuga - imeri, raporo, ibisobanuro. Urashobora kunyereka ingero z'ingene ushobora gufasha mu bwoko butandukanye bwo kwandika ivy'ubucuruzi?

analyzeInformation.title: Sesengura Amakuru
analyzeInformation.prompt: Urashobora kumfasha nte gusesengura amakuru? Nyereka uburyo butandukanye ushobora gufatira ibiharuro, kuronka uburyo, canke gukura ivyiyumviro mu nyandiko canke amakuru.

planOrganize.title: Tegura no Gutunganya
planOrganize.prompt: Urashobora kumfasha gutegura imishinga canke gutunganya akazi? Mpa ingero z'ingene ushobora gukora ibihe, ibiri mu buto, canke imigambi y'imishinga n'imiterere itandukanye.

brainstormIdeas.title: Kwirabira Ibiyumviro
brainstormIdeas.prompt: Ndashaka kwirabira ibisubizo vy'ikibazo. Nyereka ingene wigira ku kwiyumvira vy'ubuhanga no gukora ibiyumviro - ni ibibazo ubuhe wobaza kandi witondera ute ibikunda?

buildPresentations.title: Kubaka Ibiganiro
buildPresentations.prompt: Urashobora kumfasha nte gukora ibiganiro? Nyereka ingero z'imiterere itandukanye y'ibiganiro, impanuro z'amashusho, n'ingene utunganya amakuru ku bantu batandukanye.

workWithCode.title: Gukora na Kode
workWithCode.prompt: Urashobora gufasha mu gukora kode canke porogaramu nto? Nyereka ingero - haba kwandika kode nshasha, gukosora ingorane, canke gusobanura ingene ikintu gikora intambwe ku yindi.

decisionSupport.title: Inkunga mu Gufata Ingingo
decisionSupport.prompt: Nkeneye gufata ingingo ariko sindazi ingene nosuzuma amahitamwo yanje. Urashobora kunyereka uburyo butandukanye canke inzira ukoresha kugira umfashe kwiyumvira ku mahitamwo?

summarizeSynthesize.title: Gusobanura no Guhuza
summarizeSynthesize.prompt: Ufasha ute gusobanura inyandiko ndende canke guhuza amakuru avuye mu masoko menshi? Nyereka ingero z'uburyo butandukanye bwo gusobanura n'urwego rw'amakuru.

explainTopics.title: Gusobanura Ibintu Bikomeye
explainTopics.prompt: Urashobora gusobanura ibiyumviro bitoroshe mu majambo yoroshe? Nyereka ingene ucira ibiyumviro bikomeye, ukoresha ibigereranyo, kandi ukoresha ibisobanuro ku rwego rutandukanye rw'ubumenyi.

createSchedules.title: Gukora Gahunda
createSchedules.prompt: Nkeneye ubufasha bwo gutunganya umwanya no gukora gahunda. Nyereka uburyo butandukanye ushobora gutunganya ibiri mu buto, amakalinderi, canke imigambi ishingiye ku gihe hamwe n'ingero.

agents.description: Kora kandi ucunge abakozi ba AI bihariye bafise ubushobozi buhariye. Aba bakozi bakora kuri MSF AI Assistant Foundry.
agents.advancedFeatureTitle: Ikintu c'Inzobere - Bisaba Gukorana n'Umugwi w'Ubuhinga wa AI Assistant
agents.advancedFeatureWarning: Abakozi bihariye bakora gusa hamwe na MSF AI Assistant Foundry. Indangamuntu z'abakozi zitegerezwa gukorwa n'umugwi w'ubuhinga wa AI Assistant muri iki kigo kandi bigahuriwe nawe imbere yo gukoresha.
agents.noAgentsDescription: Kora umukozi wawe wihariye wa mbere kugira wongere ubushobozi bwa AI hamwe n'ibikoresho n'imyitwarire bihariye.

advancedOptions.title: Amahitamwo y'Inzobere
advancedOptions.fixedTemperatureNote: Iciyumviro: Iyi modeli ikoresha agaciro k'ubushyuhe kadahinduka ku mikorere idahinduka.

searchMode.title: Uburyo bwo Kurondera
searchMode.subtitle: Bizokoresha kurondera kuri interineti igihe bikenewe
searchMode.azureAgentModeDescription: Bihuta ariko amakuru y'ikiganiro abitswe mu kwezi
searchMode.privacyInfoDescription: Ikiganiro cawe cose cizotumwa kuri Azure AI Foundry agent.

customAgent.label: Umukozi Wihariye:
customAgent.description: Uyu mukozi akora kuri MSF AI Assistant Foundry hamwe n'ibikoresho bikomejwe buri gihe.
customAgent.webSearch: Kurondera kuri interineti mu gihe nyaco
customAgent.codeInterpreter: Umuhindurizi wa kode no gusesengura amadosiye

knowledgeCutoff.realtime: Kurondera kuri interineti mu gihe nyaco

modelTypeIcons.foundational: Modeli ihuta kandi igenga y'imigambi myinshi
modelTypeIcons.omni: Modeli y'uburyo bwinshi ifise ubushobozi bunini
modelTypeIcons.agent: Umukozi afise ibikoresho vy'igihe nyaco n'ubushobozi bwa interineti

gpt_4_1.name: GPT-4.1
gpt_4_1.description: Modeli ya AI ikoreshwa na GPT-4.1 hamwe no kurondera kuri interineti mu gihe nyaco biciye muri Bing. Itanga amakuru y'ubu, gusuzuma ukuri, n'ukumenya ibiba ubu. Ikwiye cane ubushakashatsi bukeneye amakuru y'ubu, isesengura ry'inkuru, no kwemeza ukuri.
gpt_4_1.knowledgeCutoff: Kurondera kuri interineti mu gihe nyaco

gpt_5_2.name: GPT-5.2
gpt_5_2.description: Modeli igezweho cane ya OpenAI, iri hejuru mu kwiyumvira gukomeye, gukora kode, no gukemura ibibazo vy'ubuhinga. Ikwiye cane ibikorwa vy'isesengura, ibibazo vy'amaprograme, ubushakashatsi, n'ibisobanuro birambuye. Ishigikira utwigoro tw'ukwiyumvira n'amagambo y'ikisubizo duhinduka.

gpt_5_mini.name: GPT-5 Mini
gpt_5_mini.description: Ingero ihuta kandi itari hejuru mu giciro ya GPT-5, yatunganijwe ku bwihutiro mu gihe igumana ubwiza bwinshi. Ikwiye cane ibikorwa vya buri munsi, ibibazo vya vuba, gutwara ibikoresho, n'ibikorwa bikeneye ibisubizo vya vuba. Iringaniye neza mu mikorere n'uburyo.

gpt_5_2_chat.name: GPT-5.2 Chat
gpt_5_2_chat.description: Ingero ihariye ya GPT-5.2 yatunganijwe ku biganiro n'ubwenge bw'inyiyumvo. Iri hejuru mu guhanahana kw'impuhwe, inkunga y'amagara yo mu mutwe, kwandika vy'ubuhanga, kwirabira ibiyumviro, n'ikiganiro gisanzwe. Ikwiye cane ibiganiro bisanzwe, ibiganiro vy'ubujyanama, n'ibikorwa bikeneye kumenya inyiyumvo.

o3.name: o3
o3.description: Modeli y'ukwiyumvira igezweho cane ya OpenAI ifise ubushobozi bw'igitangaza bwo gukemura ibibazo. Iri hejuru mu ndimi z'ibiharuro bikomeye, ukwiyumvira mu buhinga, ibibazo vy'amaprograme, n'ibikorwa vy'ukwiyumvira vy'intambwe nyinshi. Idirishya y'ivyiyumviro ya 200K. Ishigikira kugenzura utwigoro tw'ukwiyumvira.

llama_4_maverick.name: Llama 4 Maverick
llama_4_maverick.description: Modeli ihuta kandi itari hejuru mu giciro iva muri Meta. Nziza ku bikorwa vya buri munsi nko kwandika, gusobanura, n'ubufasha busanzwe mu gukora kode. Iringaniye neza mu bwihutiro n'ubwiza ku bikorwa bisanzwe.

deepseek_r1.name: DeepSeek-R1
deepseek_r1.description: Inzobere mu kwiyumvira yerekana akazi kayo intambwe ku yindi. Nziza cane ku bibazo vy'ibiharuro, ibibazo vy'ukwiyumvira, no gutegera ibiyumviro bikomeye. Raba ingene yiyumvira ku bibazo mu gihe nyaco.

deepseek_v3_1.name: DeepSeek-V3.1
deepseek_v3_1.description: Modeli ikomeye ku buryo bwose igeze cane mu gukora kode no kwandika ivy'ubuhinga. Nziza mu gukosora kode, kwandika inyandiko, no gusobanura ibiyumviro vy'ubuhinga. Ihuta kandi ikagiraneza ku bikorwa vy'iterambere.

grok_3.name: Grok 3
grok_3.description: Modeli y'uburyo bwinshi iva muri xAI izwi ku bisubizo vy'ubwenge. Nziza ku biganiro bidafise iherezo, imishinga vy'ubuhanga, no gukemura ibibazo bikomeye.

claude_opus_4_5.name: Claude Opus 4.5
claude_opus_4_5.description: Modeli ifise ubushobozi bwinshi cane ya Anthropic hamwe n'ukwiyumvira, gukora kode, n'ubushobozi vy'ubuhanga bidahuza. Ikwiye cane isesengura rikomeye, ubushakashatsi, n'ibikorwa bikeneye gutegera cane.

claude_sonnet_4_5.name: Claude Sonnet 4.5
claude_sonnet_4_5.description: Modeli ya Claude iringaniye itanga imikorere myiza mu gukora kode, isesengura, n'ibikorwa vy'ubuhanga. Nziza ku gukoresha kwa buri munsi hamwe n'ibisubizo vya vuba.

claude_opus_4_1.name: Claude Opus 4.1
claude_opus_4_1.description: Modeli ya Claude Opus y'iyindi nkomoko. Nziza cane ku bikorwa bikomeye vyo gukora kode, isesengura ryarambuye, no gutegera neza.

claude_haiku_4_5.name: Claude Haiku 4.5
claude_haiku_4_5.description: Modeli ya Claude ihuta kandi itari hejuru mu giciro yatunganijwe ku bikorwa vya vuba. Nziza ku bibazo bisanzwe, gusobanura, n'ibikorwa vy'ubwinshi.

searchMode.title: Uburyo bwo Kurondera Busobanuywe
searchMode.subtitle: Gutegera amahitamwo yawe yo kurondera n'aho amakuru yawe abitswe
searchMode.noSearchDescription: Ibisubizo bihuta cane ata bushobozi bwo kurondera kuri interineti. Ikiganiro cawe cose kiguma mu mushakisha wawe - nta kintu kibitswe mu kwezi.
searchMode.viewDetailsBelow: Ku makuru menshi, raba uburyo bw'ubuhinga buri hasi.
searchMode.legendNoSearch: Mushakisha Wawe (ububiko bw'aho) | Umuyagishwa wa AI Assistant | Azure OpenAI (ata bwimenyere)
searchMode.privacyDescription: Ikoresha kurondera kuri interineti igihe bikenewe ariko ibunyuranye kuko intambwe nyinshi zibayemwo. Ibibazo vyo kurondera gusa bibitswe muri Azure - ikiganiro cawe cose kiguma mu mushakisha wawe.
searchMode.legendPrivacy: Mushakisha Wawe (ububiko bw'aho) | Umuyagishwa wa AI Assistant | Azure AI Foundry (ibibazo vyo kurondera gusa) | Azure OpenAI (ata bwimenyere)
searchMode.foundryDescription: Ibisubizo bihuta hamwe n'ubushobozi bwo kurondera kuri interineti bushizemwo. Ikiganiro cawe cose kibitswe mu bubiko bwa Azure AI Foundry, atari mu mushakisha wawe gusa.
searchMode.legendFoundry: Mushakisha Wawe (ububiko bw'aho) | Umuyagishwa wa AI Assistant | Azure AI Foundry Agent (ibika ikiganiro cose)
searchMode.whyTheseOptionsText1: Ibi ni ibikorwa vyo kurondera bihari inyuma ya Azure yahagaritse Bing Search API yabo, AI Assistant yashingiye kuri yo mu ntango.
searchMode.whyTheseOptionsText2: Umugwi uriko urashaka ubundi buryo bwo kurondera bukingira ibanga kuruta. Amahitamwo yombi y'ubu akoresha ubushobozi bwo kurondera bwa Azure AI Foundry ariko atandukanye mu makuru y'ikiganiro asangiwe.
searchMode.azureDeprecatedBingApi: Azure yahagaritse Bing Search API yabo
searchMode.footerNote: Uburyo bwombi bubika ikiganiro cawe mu mushakisha wawe. Urashobora guhindura uburyo igihe cose mu mategeko ya modeli.

descriptions.foundLegacyData: Twabonye amakuru avuye mu verisiyo ya kera. Urashaka kuyimura kugira akore n'uburyo butezimberwe?
descriptions.storageSpaceWarning: Amakuru yawe akeneye umwanya munini kuruta uwuhari ubu. Tugira inama yo gukoresha uburyo bw'ukwimura intambwe ku yindi.
descriptions.pleaseWait: Nyamuneka rindira mu gihe turiko turahindura amakuru yawe...
descriptions.dataIsSafe: Amakuru yawe y'intango ari mu mutekano. Urashobora kongera kugerageza canke uvirize ubu.
descriptions.itemsTooLarge: Ibi bintu ni binini cane kugira bikwire mu bubiko. Urashobora kubisohora, gutanga umwanya, canke gukomeza utavyo.

options.deleteLegacyData: Siba amakuru ya kera inyuma yo kwimura

message.warning: Ububiko bwa mushakisha wawe buri kuri {percent}% y'ubushobozi.
message.critical: Ububiko bwa mushakisha wawe buri hasi cane kuri {percent}% y'ubushobozi.
message.emergency: Ububiko bwa mushakisha wawe buri hafi kwuzura cane kuri {percent}%!

storageWarning.consequence: Ububiko bwuzuye, urashobora kubura gushikira ibiganiro bishasha kandi porogaramu ishobora guhagarika gukora neza.

confirm.title: Emeza Gusiba
confirm.message: Iki gikorwa gizosiba burundu ibiganiro {count}. Iki gikorwa ntikishobora gusubirwamwo.

clearing.title: Gusiba Ububiko
clearing.message: Nyamuneka rindira mu gihe ibiganiro biriko birakurwa...

error.title: Gusiba Ntibyakunze
error.message: Habaye ikosa mu gusiba ibiganiro. Nyamuneka ongera ugerageze.

fileUpload.failedToOpenInEditor: Gufungura idosiye mu kihindurira kode ntibyakunze. Nyamuneka ongera ugerageze.
fileUpload.queuedForTranscription: Bishizwe mu murongo wo guhindura mu nyandiko

artifact.editsNotSaved: Ivyahindutse ntibibitswe. Tuma biciye mu butumwa canke ukurure kugira ubike ivyahindutse vyose.

codeEditor.startTyping: Tangura kwandika canke usabe AI ikore kode
codeEditor.codeWillSync: Kode izahuza ubwite bivuye mu butumwa bw'ikiganiro

dropdown.searchTooltip:
Komeza kurondera kuri interineti ku butumwa bwose.

Bitanga amakuru y'ubu bikoresheje Bing mu gihe nyaco.
dropdown.attachTooltip:
Omatanya amadosiye, amashusho, canke amajwi/amashusho.

Imiterere yemewe:
‚Ä¢ Amashusho: JPEG, PNG, GIF, WebP (5MB ntarengwa, kugeza 10)
‚Ä¢ Inyandiko: PDF, DOCX, XLSX, PPTX, TXT, MD (10MB ntarengwa, kugeza 3)
‚Ä¢ Amakuru: CSV, JSON, XML, YAML (10MB ntarengwa, kugeza 3)
‚Ä¢ Kode: PY, JS, TS, JAVA, C, CPP, GO, n'ibindi (10MB ntarengwa, kugeza 3)
‚Ä¢ Amajwi/Amashusho: MP3, WAV, MP4, WebM (25MB ntarengwa, idosiye 1)

Hamwe: amadosiye 10, 50MB ntarengwa
dropdown.transcribeTooltip:
Shiriza amadosiye y'amajwi canke amashusho yo guhindura mu nyandiko.

Imiterere yemewe: MP3, MP4, WAV, WebM, M4A, MPEG, MPGA
Ingano ntarengwa: 25MB

Guhindura mu nyandiko biraba ubwite iyo utumye ubutumwa.
dropdown.selectToneDescription: Hitamo umwirondoro w'ijwi ku butumwa bwawe
dropdown.createTonesHint: Kora amajwi mu Bikorwa vya Vuba
dropdown.translateDocumentTooltip:
Hindura inyandiko mu rurimi rwundi.

Imiterere yemewe: Word, Excel, PowerPoint, PDF, HTML, TXT
Ingano ntarengwa: 40MB

Bishigikira indimi 80+ hamwe n'amadosiye y'amajambo.

transcription.instructionsPlaceholder: Ivyiyumviro vyo gutezimbere ukutomoye (nk'urugero, amazina, amajambo)
transcription.maxDurationNote: Amadosiye manini arashobora gufata kugeza ku minota {minutes}
transcription.timedOut: Guhindura mu nyandiko byarenze umwanya inyuma y'iminota {minutes}
transcription.fetchError: Gupakira inyandiko ntibyakunze. Nyamuneka ongera ugerageze.
transcription.transcriptExpired: Inyandiko ya {filename} yararangiye. Inyandiko zisibwa ubwite inyuma y'iminsi {days} ku bw'ibanga.
transcription.expirationWarning: Inyandiko ya {filename} izarangira mu minsi {days}. Kopiya ibiri muri nimba ukeneye kubibika.

documentTranslation.title: Guhindura Inyandiko
documentTranslation.glossaryHelp: Shiriza idosiye y'amajambo ya CSV, TSV, canke XLIFF ku majambo yihariye.
documentTranslation.glossaryTooLarge: Idosiye y'amajambo ni nini cane. Ingano ntarengwa ni {maxSize}.
documentTranslation.documentTooLarge: Inyandiko ni nini cane. Ingano ntarengwa ni {maxSize}.
documentTranslation.expired: Iyi nyandiko yahindutse yararangiye kandi ntikiri guhari

customAgents.title: Abakozi Bihariye
customAgents.experimentalBlurb: Ivy'ubugeragezi ‚Äî byubatswe mu gukorana gutumbereye n'abakoresha ba MSF b'ubushobozi. Atari ku gukoresha kwa bose.

privacy.policyDescription: Iga ingene amakuru yawe akingirwa n'amakuru adakwiye kwinjizwa
privacy.termsDescription: Suzuma amabwirizwa yo gukoresha neza n'ivyabuza
privacy.localStorage: Ibiganiro vyawe bibitswe aho kuri cuma cawe
privacy.azureInfra: Gutunganya amakuru vyose biraba mu buryo bwa MSF hakoreshejwe ubuhinga bwa Azure
privacy.noPersonalData: Ntiwinjize amakuru y'umuntu ku giti ciwe (amazina, nimero z'itelefone, n'ibindi)
privacy.contactUs: Twandikire bidatevye nimba ufise ibibazo vy'ibanga:

variableModal.fillInstructions: Uzuza ibihindagurika biri hasi kugira uhindure ikibazo cawe gisanzwe

chatInput.filePickerError: Ntibibashijwe gufungura igihitamwo c'amadosiye. Gerageza gukoresha gukurura no kurekanura mu kibanza.
